front.title: Providing Quality of Service Indication by the BGP-4 Protocol: the QOS_NLRI attribute

abstract.t: This draft specifies an additional BGP4 (Border Gateway Protocol, version 4, [2]) attribute, named the 'QOS_NLRI' attribute, which aims at providing QoS (Quality of Service)-related information associated to the NLRI (Network Layer Reachability Information) information conveyed in a BGP UPDATE message.
